snippet.title: Trident's Tale - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Uncover the Secrets of the Storm Trident and Rule the Seas - Your Legend Awaits in Trident's Tale! 🏴‍☠️🦜
Get ready to set sail for adventure! Independent studio 3DClouds is delighted to reveal the brand new third-person pirate action game Trident’s Tale launching worldwide for PC, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch platforms May 2025. PC version available on Steam, Epic Store and GOG. 


WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM ! 
---------------------------------------------
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2541780/Tridents_Tale

Live Soon on Epic Store
---------------------------------------------
https://store.epicgames.com/p/tridents-tale-66701d

Join Our Discord
---------------------------------------------
https://discord.gg/d9Wb7mPs
